Create a DIY Soap Bar: Use coconut oil, shea butter, and essential oils to create your own soap bar. This will not only keep you clean but also provide a luxurious and relaxing experience.
Make a Clay Mask: Clay is a natural detoxifier that can help to draw out impurities and excess oil from your skin. Mix clay with water to create a paste and apply it to your face for 10-15 minutes.

Use a Microfiber Cloth: Microfiber cloths are gentle on your skin and can help to remove dirt and grime without stripping your skin of its natural oils. Use it to clean your face, body, and hair for a quick and easy clean.

Try a Salt Scrub: Salt is a natural exfoliant that can help to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and refreshed. Mix salt with oil or coconut oil to create a scrub that you can use on your face and body.
